tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DNA_Sequences (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  processed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false
)

CREATE TABLE SequenceMetadata (
  metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_id INT,
  metadata_key TEXT,
  metadata_value TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_sequence FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id) REFERENCES Sequence(sequence_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE TransactionLog (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id INT,
  table_name TEXT,
  operation TEXT,
  CONSTRAINT chk_operation CHECK (operation IN ('INSERT', 'UPDATE', 'DELETE')),
  CONSTRAINT fk_transaction FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transaction(transaction_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
